applicationId.description: The Application ID that the assessment relates to

legacyApplicationId.description: The Legacy Application ID (known previously in the legacy systems as Representation Order ID / MAAT ID) that the assessment relates to

usn.description: The Unique Serial Number (USN) of the  assessment from Crime Apply (if applicable)

caseManagementUnitId.description: The Case Management Unit ID, which is determined based on the current user and their selected Local Justice Area (LJA)

userSession.description: Contains the username and session id for the user performing the request
